entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
